verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD צוּרִ֗י <S%H6697><s%> my strength הַֽמְלַמֵּ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> which teacheth יָדַ֣י <S%H3027><s%> my hands לַקְרָ֑ב <S%H7128><s%> to war אֶ֝צְבְּעוֹתַ֗י <S%H676><s%> [and] my fingers לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> to fight

חַסְדִּ֥י <S%H2617><s%> My goodness וּמְצוּדָתִי֮ <S%H4686><s%> and my fortress מִשְׂגַּבִּ֪י <S%H4869><s%> my high tower וּֽמְפַלְטִ֫י <S%H6403><s%> and my deliverer לִ֥י מָ֭גִנִּי <S%H4043><s%> my shield וּב֣וֹ חָסִ֑יתִי <S%H2620><s%> and [he] in whom I trust הָרוֹדֵ֖ד <S%H7286><s%> who subdueth עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> my people תַחְתָּֽי׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> what [is] man וַתֵּדָעֵ֑הוּ <S%H3045><s%> that thou takest knowledge בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of him [or] the son אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> that וַֽתְּחַשְּׁבֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2803><s%> that thou makest account
אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> Man לַהֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> to vanity דָּמָ֑ה <S%H1819><s%> is like יָ֝מָ֗יו <S%H3117><s%> his days כְּצֵ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> [are] as a shadow עוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> that passeth away

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD הַט־ <S%H5186><s%> Bow שָׁמֶ֣יךָ <S%H8064><s%> thy heavens וְתֵרֵ֑ד <S%H3381><s%> and come down גַּ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> touch בֶּהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H6225><s%> and they shall smoke

בְּר֣וֹק <S%H1299><s%> Cast forth בָּ֭רָק <S%H1300><s%> lightning וּתְפִיצֵ֑ם <S%H6327><s%> and scatter שְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> them shoot out חִ֝צֶּ֗יךָ <S%H2671><s%> thine arrows וּתְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <S%H2000><s%> and destroy

שְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> Send יָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand מִמָּ֫ר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> from above פְּצֵ֣נִי <S%H6475><s%> rid וְ֭הַצִּילֵנִי <S%H5337><s%> me and deliver מִמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> me out of great מִ֝יַּ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> from the hand בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> children נֵכָֽר׃ <S%H5236><s%> of strange

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <S%H6310><s%> Whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <S%H3225><s%> and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> of falsehood

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> unto thee O God שִׁ֣יר <S%H7891><s%> I will sing חָ֭דָשׁ <S%H2319><s%> a new אָשִׁ֣ירָה <S%H7892><s%> song לָּ֑ךְ בְּנֵ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> upon a psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <S%H6218><s%> [and] an instrument of ten strings אֲזַמְּרָה־ <S%H2167><s%> will I sing praises לָּֽךְ׃

הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> [It is he] that giveth תְּשׁוּעָ֗ה <S%H8668><s%> salvation לַמְּלָ֫כִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> unto kings הַ֭פּוֹצֶה <S%H6475><s%> who delivereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> David עַבְדּ֗וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant מֵחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> from the hurtful

פְּצֵ֥נִי <S%H6475><s%> Rid וְהַצִּילֵנִי֮ <S%H5337><s%> me and deliver מִיַּ֪ד <S%H3027><s%> me from the hand בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> children נֵ֫כָ֥ר <S%H5236><s%> of strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <S%H6310><s%> whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <S%H3225><s%> and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> of falsehood

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Let בָּנֵ֨ינוּ ׀ <S%H1121><s%> That our sons כִּנְטִעִים֮ <S%H5195><s%> [may be] as plants מְגֻדָּלִ֪ים <S%H1431><s%> grown up בִּֽנְעוּרֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H5271><s%> in their youth בְּנוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> [that] our daughters כְזָוִיֹּ֑ת <S%H2106><s%> [may be] as corner stones מְ֝חֻטָּב֗וֹת <S%H2404><s%> polished תַּבְנִ֥ית <S%H8403><s%> [after] the similitude הֵיכָֽל׃ <S%H1964><s%> of a palace

מְזָוֵ֣ינוּ <S%H4200><s%> [That] our garners מְלֵאִים֮ <S%H4392><s%> [may be] full מְפִיקִ֥ים <S%H6329><s%> affording מִזַּ֗ן <S%H2177><s%> every אֶ֫ל־ <S%H413><s%> about זַ֥ן <S%H2177><s%> kind צֹאונֵ֣נוּ <S%H6629><s%> [that] our sheep מַ֭אֲלִיפוֹת <S%H503><s%> may bring forth thousands מְרֻבָּב֗וֹת <S%H7231><s%> and ten thousands בְּחוּצוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H2351><s%> in our streets

אַלּוּפֵ֗ינוּ <S%H441><s%> [That] our oxen מְֽסֻבָּ֫לִ֥ים <S%H5445><s%> [may be] strong to labour אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> Without פֶּ֭רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> [that there be] no breaking in וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and without יוֹצֵ֑את <S%H3318><s%> nor going out וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no צְ֝וָחָ֗ה <S%H6682><s%> that [there be] no complaining בִּרְחֹבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H7339><s%> in our streets

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Happy הָ֭עָם <S%H5971><s%> [is that] people שֶׁכָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> that is in such a case לּ֑וֹ אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> [yea] happy הָ֝עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> [is that] people שֶׁיֲהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> whose God
